result.eng: They took off everything I was wearing.
result.ga: Bhain siad díom a raibh umam
result.orig: Bhain siad díom a raibh umam
result.html: Bhain siad díom a raibh umamThey took off everything I was wearing.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain siad díom a raiḃ umamThey took off everything I was wearing.

result.html: Is cuimhin liom gach rudI remember everything.
result.ponchtml: Is cuiṁin liom gaċ rudI remember everything.

result.eng: If you believe this, you will believe everything.
result.ga: Má chreideann tú é seo creidfidh tú gach rud
result.orig: Má chreideann tú é seo creidfidh tú gach rud
result.html: Má chreideann tú é seo creidfidh tú gach rudIf you believe this, you will believe everything.
result.ponchtml: Má ċreideann tú é seo creidfiḋ tú gaċ rudIf you believe this, you will believe everything.

result.html: Scrios an stoirm gach rudThe storm destroyed everything.
result.ponchtml: Scrios an stoirm gaċ rudThe storm destroyed everything.

result.ga: Tá gach rud anseo ceart go leor
result.orig: Tá gach rud anseo ceart go leor
result.html: Tá gach rud anseo ceart go leorEverything here is okay.
result.ponchtml: Tá gaċ rud anseo ceart go leorEverything here is okay.

result.eng: Have you read everything these authors have written?
result.ga: Ar léigh tú gach ar scríobh na húdair seo
result.orig: Ar léigh tú gach ar scríobh na húdair seo
result.html: Ar léigh tú gach ar scríobh na húdair seoHave you read everything these authors have written?
result.ponchtml: Ar léiġ tú gaċ ar scríoḃ na húdair seoHave you read everything these authors have written?

result.eng: Everything he did, he made it look elegant and neat.
result.ga: Gach rud a rinne sé chuir sé maise agus slacht air
result.orig: Gach rud a rinne sé chuir sé maise agus slacht air
result.html: Gach rud a rinne sé chuir sé maise agus slacht airEverything he did, he made it look elegant and neat.
result.ponchtml: Gaċ rud a rinne sé ċuir sé maise agus slaċt airEverything he did, he made it look elegant and neat.

result.eng: Everything only lasts for a short time.
result.ga: Ní mhaireann aon ní ach seal
result.orig: Ní mhaireann aon ní ach seal
result.html: Ní mhaireann aon ní ach sealEverything only lasts for a short time.
result.ponchtml: Ní ṁaireann aon ní aċ sealEverything only lasts for a short time.

result.eng: They [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.
result.ga: Bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéir
result.orig: Bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéir
result.html: Bhíodh raon fairsing ábhair faoi chaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á nochtadh faoi achan rud faoin spéirThey [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.
result.ponchtml: Ḃíoḋ raon fairsing áḃair faoi ċaibidil iontu agus tuairimí á noċtaḋ faoi aċan rud faoin spéirThey [ie. blogs] were dealing with a wide range of topics and giving opinions on everything under the sun.

result.eng: They decorated everything as neatly as they could.
result.ga: Feistíodh 'ach aon rud chomh deismir agus a féadadh
result.orig: Feistíodh 'ach aon rud chomh deismir agus a féadadh
result.html: Feistíodh 'ach aon rud chomh deismir agus a féadadhThey decorated everything as neatly as they could.
result.ponchtml: Feistíoḋ 'aċ aon rud ċoṁ deismir agus a féadaḋThey decorated everything as neatly as they could.
